j.core.codegenerator¶

  • path: /portal/codegentools/CodeGenerator.py

generate¶

  • params: spec,type,typecheck,dieInGenCode,appserverclient,instance,redis,wsclient,codepath,classpath,returnClass,args,makeCopy
  • path:/portal/codegentools/CodeGenerator.py (line:177)

param: spec is spec we want to generate from param: type JSModel,actormethodgreenlet,enumeration,actorlocal param: typecheck (means in generated code the types will be checked) param: dieInGenCode if true means in generated code we will die when something uneforeseen happens return: dict of classes if more than 1 otherwise just the class
